name: http://linksys.com/jnap/locale/Locale
desc: This service provides access to locale-related device properties and settings.

GetLocale.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/locale/GetLocale
GetLocale.desc: This action gets the device's locale.

supportedLocales.desc: The list of locales supported by the device, in RFC 3066 format.

locale.desc: The current locale of the device, in RFC 3066 format.

GetTimeSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/locale/GetTimeSettings
GetTimeSettings.desc: This action gets the device's time settings.

timeZoneID.desc: The ID of the device's current time zone.

autoAdjustForDST.desc: Whether the device adjusts its time zone automatically to account for Daylight Saving Time.

supportedTimeZones.desc: The list of supported offsets from UTC (in minutes) that the device's local time can be set to.

currentTime.desc: The current time according to the device's local clock in UTC.

SetLocale.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/locale/SetLocale
SetLocale.desc: This action sets the device's locale.

locale.desc: The desired locale of the device, in RFC 3066 format.

errors.ErrorUnsupportedLocale: The specified locale is not supported by the device.

SetTimeSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/locale/SetTimeSettings
SetTimeSettings.desc: This action sets the device's time settings.

timeZoneID.desc: The ID of the desired time zone for the device.

autoAdjustForDST.desc: Whether the device should adjust its time zone automatically to account for Daylight Saving Time. If the specified time zone does not observe DST, this value must be false.

errors.ErrorTimeZoneDoesNotObserveDST: The value of the autoAdjustForDST parameter was specified as true, but the specified time zone does not observe DST.
errors.ErrorUnknownTimeZone: The specified time zone ID does not correspond to any of the time zones supported by the device.

timeZoneID.desc: A unique identifier for the time zone.

utcOffsetMinutes.desc: The number of minutes that the time zone is offset from Universal Coordinated Time (UTC). NOTE: This is a static offset in minutes from UTC in Standard Time. It does not adjust to take into account Daylight Saving Time.

observesDST.desc: Whether the time zone observes Daylight Saving Time (DST).

description.desc: A human-readable description of the time zone.
